mapper.select:
SELECT a.*,b.role_name as rolename,c.name as menuname,d.username as username FROM sys_role_menu_log a LEFT JOIN sys_role b on a.roleid = b.id LEFT JOIN sys_menu c on a.menuid = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_user d on a.userid = d.id WHERE 1=1 and a.is_delete = 'N'
ORDER BY id desc
mapper.insert: insert into sys_role_menu_log (roleid, menuid, userid, types,branchname,subcode, create_time,creator,update_time,updator,is_delete) values (#{roleid}, #{menuid}, #{userid}, #{types}, #{branchname},#{subcode},now(),#{creator},now(),#{updator},'N')
mapper.delete: UPDATE sys_role_menu_log set is_delete = 'Y' WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: update sys_role_menu_log set roleid = #{roleid}, menuid = #{menuid}, userid = #{userid}, types = #{types}, update_time = now(), updator = #{updator} where id = #{id}
